item.title: 2D Top-Down Aiming Using the Mouse in Unity3D
item.description: Hello, in this short (and first!) post on this blog I would like to show you how to make a sprite face the mouse cursor. This is quite useful for aiming in top-down shooters and similar games. You can see an example of this in this gif. Table Of Contents The code Explaining the code Now let’s talk about the code. I tried various solutions found on the web, but most of them don’t work, work sometimes or work badly.
